full_text.0: @pkeeler167 Pulisic Aaronson Reyna, musah mckennie adams, Robinson ream Zimmerman dest. Play Aaronson as a false 9 to help support the midfield build up play out of the back greg insists on and let pulisic and Reyna run wild and score cause they our two best players.
full_text.1: @YanksUSA @FIFAWorldCup @USMNT @usmntonly @ManagerTactical @11Yanks @USMNTTAKES @USMNT_Thoughts @USMNTEurosnobs @RealUSMNT @TaylorTwellman False 9 pulisic,Aaronson,Reyna (if Reyna can’t start weah at the 9 Aaronson right regular 4-3-3) mckennie, adams, musah, Robinson, ream, Zimmerman, dest, turner
full_text.2: @__adel11 @jennyachiu This is exactly what I thought too with respect to Haji.  Adams, McKinney, and Pulisic have been playing with him for YEARS on youth developmental teams. THEY wanted him on this team. There is something to be said for that though...
